```{r}
hh_survey <-
  read_rds(
    file.path(
      path_box,
      "Data",
      "HouseholdSurvey",
      "DataSets",
      "Final",
      "hh-survey.rds"
    )
  ) %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    survey == "Household Survey"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    sample_group = factor(sample_group, ordered = FALSE)
  )
```

```{r}
feols(
  disctcr_02 ~ sample_group,
  data = hh_survey %>% dplyr::filter(country == "Uganda"),
  cluster = ~ village_id
)
```
